website_summaries.verdict: This 18-piece set presents a solid value for basic air compressor accessories to use for tasks around the house or in a shop.
pros: Has wide range of included pieces for various tasks
Includes seals to use with individual pieces
Trigger mechanism is easy to grip and satisfying to use
Conveniently includes tools to test the air pressure in car tires
cons: Some users say the tire pressure gauge reads a little low

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for casual garage use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as the old connector I used to fill car tires was wearing out. For $12, it's a good set for messing around in the garage and occasional use, but it doesn't seem like a heavy duty set (but what do you expect for $12?). The tire pressure gauge that came in the pack was not the one in the picture when ordered, and it actually read a 2-3 pounds under what my 'good' pressure gauge showed. I was really buying the connectors, and not the gauge, so that didn't bother me, but be aware of it if purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Dolmanet

customer_reviews.title: No Issues
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of this kit for the price. Usually you'll see the thread on stuff like this is chewed up, or some of the stuff will look like it missed the de-bur process in the machine shop. All the stuff in this kit looked clean, everything I've used so far threaded fine, haven't had any issues. Definitely recommend picking this up if you need to expand usage of your compressor on the cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Leakingest crap ever. Used the Teflon tape as well as the gaskets and kept thinking it was them that was leaking. Turned out it was the quick fit. Gave up on that and tried the tire nosle. That was also crap. It leaked worse then the fitting. Dave your money don't buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: danny Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great things come in small package
customer_reviews.text: Came in a very small box but definitely has large application abilities. Love the product and works great. Highly recommend. I use all the time with my new porter cable compressor.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as predicted.
customer_reviews.text: The components arrived in a plastic case I immediately fixed up the blowing nozzle to blow out a family of ants living in my electronic gate opener, very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality air compressor kit. Not the cheesy kit that you can buy cheaper elsewhere. Solid brass fittings are excellent. Beware of the cheap tire pressure gauge. This is the only piece that is worthless!
customer_reviews.author: Mouse 55

customer_reviews.title: So far so good- no instructions
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only used the P Piece for the air compression to inflate tires. No I instructions were included so it did take a minute to figure out what fit with what.
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Good Fittings
customer_reviews.text: They pack alot of stuff in a small box. Every hinge and hasp was broke from the plastic box they shoved it in
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wright

customer_reviews.title: Air compressor tools
customer_reviews.text: Products seem to be of quality. Excellent accessory kit for every desired fitting. Multiple projects can get done with these tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed and a little more!
customer_reviews.text: I needed accessories for an air compressor that I got as a Christmas and this package filled the bill!
customer_reviews.author: "Dog Meat"

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Has it all in a neat storage case.
customer_reviews.text: Love it all! Tire gauge pops right on the tire with swivel head not seen in the pictures. High quality. Comes in cute plastic case.
customer_reviews.author: Swtchks

customer_reviews.title: The kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit was exactly what I needed and good quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Northcutt

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory kit
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he's been very pleased with all the products thus far. Great Christmas Present!
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: works for my existing compressor fittings
customer_reviews.text: I order the accessory kit for my compressor, I was missing a specific piece, I needed to air clean a carburetor with small jet ports to blow out debris lodge in. The price is little considering two hardware store or big box chains did not have the accessories I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: every thing fits
customer_reviews.text: parts look like they will last a long time good construction
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Geras

product_meta.title: Air Compressor Accessory Kit astarye 1/4" NPT Air Compressor Connect Coupler/Blow Gun/Tire Gauge/Storage Case/18 pieces
product_meta.description:
This 18 Piece air accessory kit has all the most commonly used air compressor accessory items, 
all packed in a durable clear storage case for easy access and organization. 
Included in the kit are all of the essential items: a blow gun with 4 different nozzle attachments, 
1 quick connect couplers, 6 quick connect plugs for a variety of tools, a dual air chuck and ball foot chuck for tire inflation, a tire gauge, PTFE sealant tape, and a variety of air hose connection fittings.
All the outside thread with sealant, which is much better for sealing.
Package Include:
1pc-Coupler 1/4in NPT(F)
1pc-Thread Seal Tape
1pc-Dual Fool Chuck
1pc-Blow Gun
1pc-100 psi Gauge
1pc-Safety Nozzle
1pc-Rubber Tip
1pc-Tapered Inflator
1pc-Male Couplings
1pc-Inflation Needles Sleeve
2pc-Inflation Needles
3pc-Plugs 1/4" MNPT
2pc-Plugs 1/4" FNPT
1pc-Female Couping
feature_bullets: ▲[3 IN 1 function]-This kit can be roughly divided into 3 parts. The first part is a variety of Connect Couplers, the second part is a blow gun, and the third part is Tire Gauge and Inflation Needles. Compact and easy to carry and store.

▲[ Connect Coupler]-There are various connectors required for air compressors in the kit，4 Male NPT plugs，2 female NPT plugs，1 female coupler，1 Male Couplings，Enough to meet the normal operation of the air compressor.
▲[air blow gun]-Use the connector inside the kit to assemble a blowing gun， NPT air inlet lets you to connect the air hose from either top or bottom to suit your needs.
▲[Tire Gauge and Inflation Needles]-Tire gauge can test the air pressure in the sphere or car tires. Replace the air pressure needle to inflate the related pneumatic equipment.

▲[After-sale service]-30 days money back, and lifetime support customer service after you purchase it. If you have any questiion with Air Compressor Accessory Kit ,please feel free to contact us via email.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars65 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
